ModelLoaderPrompt.Objective: Generate an XML representation for returning models based on the user-provided specifications.
ModelLoaderPrompt.SystemMessage: This prompt is designed to guide the generation of XML structures for model retrieval, ensuring clarity and consistency in the output.

Step.Action: Identify and list the attributes that the model will return.
Step.OutputFormat: <Model type="Model Compose Pothos"> <Attribute entity="Attribute1" type="Type1" /> <Attribute entity="Attribute2" type="Type2" /> <!-- Add more attributes as needed --> </Model>

Step.Action: Outline the logic and steps required to retrieve and return the model.
Step.OutputFormat: <RetrievalLogic> <Step description="Step1Description" /> <Step description="Step2Description" /> <!-- Add more steps as needed --> </RetrievalLogic>

Step.Action: List any dependencies or configurations needed for the model retrieval.
Step.OutputFormat: <Dependencies> <Dependency name="Dependency1" version="Version1" /> <!-- Add more dependencies as needed --> </Dependencies> <Configurations> <Configuration key="ConfigKey1" value="ConfigValue1" /> <!-- Add more configurations as needed --> </Configurations>

ModelLoaderPrompt.Outcome: An XML structure representing the model loader, including attributes, retrieval logic, dependencies, and configurations.
ModelLoaderPrompt.ExampleOutput: <ModelLoader> <Model type="Model Compose Pothos"> <Attribute entity="ID" type="Integer" /> <Attribute entity="Name" type="String" /> <Attribute entity="CreatedAt" type="DateTime" /> </Model> <RetrievalLogic> <Step description="Connect to database" /> <Step description="Execute query to fetch model data" /> <Step description="Map query results to model attributes" /> </RetrievalLogic> <Dependencies> <Dependency name="DatabaseDriver" version="1.2.3" /> </Dependencies> <Configurations> <Configuration key="QueryTimeout" value="30s" /> <Configuration key="MaxConnections" value="10" /> </Configurations> </ModelLoader>
